VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Briannaville?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Briannaville is arc {Michaelchester}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Carterside?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Carterside is arc {Jessestad}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Michaelchester to Carterside in the chord chart?

What is the flow value from Jessestad to Carterside in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Jessestad and Carterside in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Jessestad and Carterside is {842}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Michaelchester and Briannaville in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Michaelchester and Briannaville is {240}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Jessestad?
SC.A: The total flow output from Jessestad is {1376}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Michaelchester?
SC.A: The total flow input by Michaelchester is {1266}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 703? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {842} from {Jessestad} to {Carterside}, a flow of {738} from {Carterside} to {Jessestad}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 322? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {298} from {Briannaville} to {Michaelchester}, a flow of {240} from {Michaelchester} to {Briannaville}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 390 and 578? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {534} from {Jessestad} to {Michaelchester}, a flow of {469} from {Michaelchester} to {Jessestad}, a flow of {434} from {Carterside} to {Michaelchester}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Carterside to Briannaville or from Briannaville to Michaelchester?
NC.A: The flow from {Carterside} to {Briannaville} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Briannaville to Carterside, from Briannaville to Michaelchester, or from Jessestad to Michaelchester?
NC.A: The flow from {Briannaville} to {Carterside} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Jessestad}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Carterside} and {Jessestad}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Carterside, Arc Jessestad, Arc Michaelchester, Arc Briannaville}.
